https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xhRbfdGRcEv6RUiAfWnER2pOCcU.jpg To escape a scandal, a bestselling author journeys to Scotland, where she falls in love with a castle -- and faces off with the grumpy duke who owns it. A Castle for Christmas
